channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.description: 主要功能 业主在线投票; 业委会发布投票信息; 短信群发，提醒未投票业主参与 业委会维护业主信息-真实业主信息来源业委会：姓名，房号，手机号码; 接口设计 Method Path Description authenticated Available from UI GET proprietor GET vote/{id} Get specified vote x GET voting/{voteId} Get the vote subsidiary × POST voting proprietorId,voteId POST support proprietorId,votingId 代码结构 shujun/ app/ main.go
